headline: HCA Healthcare Announces $1.5 Million HCA Healthcare Foundation Grant to Support March of Dimes' Low Dose, Big Benefits™ Campaign
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., November 05, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced the HCA Healthcare Foundation, through its Healthier Tomorrow Fund, will strengthen its collaboration with March of Dimes, a leading nonprofit fighting for the health of all moms and babies, through a new $1.5 million grant to support their Low Dose, Big Benefits campaign.

content.title: HCA Healthcare Announces $1.5 Million HCA Healthcare Foundation Grant to Support March of Dimes' Low Dose, Big Benefits™ Campaign
content.summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., November 05, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced the HCA Healthcare Foundation, through its Healthier Tomorrow Fund, will strengthen its collaboration with March of Dimes, a leading nonprofit fighting for the health of all moms and babies, through a new $1.5 million grant to support their Low Dose, Big Benefits campaign.
